LanguageData.TD.SettingReclaimAggresively: Reclaim home beds even if they were claimed by someone else
LanguageData.TD.SettingReclaimAggresivelyDesc: They do re-claim their home bed when they return to the colony, but only if the bed was unoccupied
LanguageData.TD.SettingFarFromBed: Use bedroll if too far from assigned bed
LanguageData.TD.SettingFarFromBedAmount: Use inventory bedroll if assigned bed is at least this far away:
